tr.td: fixed pattern bug + completed Ant support
fixes vertical table cell alignment in diagrams
Maven UMLX Plugin, requires artifacts listed in Dependencies

subsection.name: Installation
subsection.p: Manual install:Download the Maven UMLX Plugin jar and copy it in {MAVEN_HOME}/plugins where {MAVEN_HOME} is the location where you have installed Maven. Make sure you also remove any previous UMLX plugin from {MAVEN_HOME}/plugins and delete from your {USER_HOME}/.maven/plugins directory.
Place the artifacts below in the Maven repository at the given location. Currently these are not available on the public Maven repository server. Goto Dependencies for downloading this artifact.

subsection.name: Acknowledgement
subsection.p: The Maven UMLX plugin makes use of the ClassFile read/write package from Kimberley Burchett
